participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Alex values deep connections with friends and family but sometimes struggles with feelings of disconnection.
participant_1.background: I am a swimmer who is proud of my family but sometimes feel disconnected from them. I make sure my beta fish travels with me when I move. I bought a set of dice for my favorite tabletop game. I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow. I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.

participant_2.name: Jasmine
participant_2.personality: Energetic and imaginative, Jasmine has a love for creativity and enjoys expressing herself through her hobbies.
participant_2.background: I grew up playing make believe with my family. I listen to rock music. I want to be in good shape for my cosplay at Comic Con, so I try to exercise every day. I live in a small home and love my collection of comic books. I have a nice smile.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I love to go to Comic Con and dress up as characters from my favorite comics.
That sounds like fun! I like to play tabletop games.
I like to play Dungeons and Dragons.
Oh cool, I've heard of that but never played it.
It's a lot of fun, you should give it a try.
I might have to, it sounds like a good time.
What kind of rock music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of rock, but my favorite is probably classic rock.
Me too! I love bands like The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I also like The Doors, Jimi Hendrix, and Pink Floyd.
Oh yeah, I love all of those bands too. It looks like we have a lot in common!
It does! I'm glad we met.
